description: My biggest knowledge lies in React but i'm not scared to work with Node.js, Socket.io, GraphQL or MongoDB. In my projects i mostly use TypeScript, Redux and styled-components. One of my main goals is to reach senior level of programming and learn other frameworks such as Vue.js or React Native. In free time, i'm learning Japanese. I strive (or at least i'm trying) to be fluent in this language. In the future, i have plans to learn Korean too.

projects.watch-together: Web site on which you can watch videos together with your friends.
projects.vocupractice: Web site to help with learning vocabulary.
projects.video-v2: Video upload, authorization, playlists, channels, admin panel.
projects.korean-practice: Korean language help, authorization, account, words save, tests.
projects.notes: Creating notes, tags, favorites, user account, editor, trash.
projects.chat-v2: Authorization, accounts, youtube videos, multiple chats, links.
projects.windows: Creating files, playing videos, music and pictures, calculator, terminal, paint
